languages.text: Перезагрузка {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}щитов{/g} снижает эффективность корабля — в следующем ходу {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}скорость{/g} движения и {g|Encyclopedia:FiringRangeSpace}дальность стрельбы{/g} орудий будут ниже.

{g|f:bd61b300bcd84e06a80c8cf3b699c78b}Restart Shields{/g} reduces the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s combat efficiency: on its next turn, it will have reduced movement {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}speed{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:FiringRangeSpace}firing range{/g}.
languages.original_text: Перезагрузка {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}щитов{/g} снижает эффективность корабля — в следующем ходу {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}скорость{/g} движения и {g|Encyclopedia:FiringRangeSpace}дальность стрельбы{/g} орудий будут ниже.

traits.locale_text: Restarting the shields reduces the flagship's combat efficiency: on its next turn, it will have reduced movement speed and range of fire.
Restarting the shields reduces the flagship's combat efficiency: on its next turn, it will have reduced movement speed and range of fire.
Restarting the shields reduces the flagship's combat efficiency: on its next turn, it will have reduced movement speed and firing range.

Restarting the {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}shields{/g} reduces the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s combat efficiency: on its next turn, it will have reduced movement {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}speed{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:FiringRangeSpace}firing range{/g}.

Restarting the {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}shields{/g} reduces the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s combat efficiency: on its next turn, it will have reduced movement {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}speed{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:FiringRangeSpace}firing range{/g}.

languages.text: {g|f:bd61b300bcd84e06a80c8cf3b699c78b}Reiniciar escudos{/g} reduce la eficacia en combate de la {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}nave insignia{/g}: en su siguiente turno, tendrá una {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}velocidad{/g} de movimiento y un {g|Encyclopedia:FiringRangeSpace}alcance de disparo{/g} reducidos.
languages.original_text: {g|f:bd61b300bcd84e06a80c8cf3b699c78b}Restart Shields{/g} reduces the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s combat efficiency: on its next turn, it will have reduced movement {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}speed{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:FiringRangeSpace}firing range{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Reiniciar los escudos reduce la eficacia en combate de la {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}nave insignia{/g}: en su siguiente {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, tendrá una {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}velocidad{/g} de movimiento y un {g|Encyclopedia:Range}alcance{/g} de disparo reducidos.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}シールド{/g}を再起動すると、{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗艦{/g}の戦闘効率が低下する。次のターンでは、旗艦の移動{g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}速度{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:FiringRangeSpace}射程距離{/g}が低下する。
languages.original_text: Restarting the {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}shields{/g} reduces the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s combat efficiency: on its next turn, it will have reduced movement {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}speed{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:FiringRangeSpace}firing range{/g}.

traits.locale_text: シールドを再起動すると、{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗艦{/g}の戦闘効率が低下する。次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}では、旗艦の移動{g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}速度{/g}と射程{g|Encyclopedia:Range}距離{/g}が低下する。

languages.text: {g|f:bd61b300bcd84e06a80c8cf3b699c78b}重启护盾{/g}会削弱{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗舰{/g}的战斗能力。重启护盾后，旗舰在下个回合中的移动{g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}速度{/g}与武器{g|Encyclopedia:FiringRangeSpace}射程{/g}都会降低。
languages.original_text: {g|f:bd61b300bcd84e06a80c8cf3b699c78b}Restart Shields{/g} reduces the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s combat efficiency: on its next turn, it will have reduced movement {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}speed{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:FiringRangeSpace}firing range{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 重启护盾会削弱{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗舰{/g}的战斗能力。重启护盾后，旗舰在下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}中的移动速度与武器射程都会降低。{g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Range}{/g}

languages.text: Die {g|f:bd61b300bcd84e06a80c8cf3b699c78b}Wiederherstellung der Schilde{/g} verringert die Kampfeffizienz des {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}Flaggschiffs{/g}: In seinem nächsten Zug hat es eine verringerte {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}Bewegungsgeschwindigkeit{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:FiringRangeSpace}Feuerreichweite{/g}.
languages.original_text: {g|f:bd61b300bcd84e06a80c8cf3b699c78b}Restart Shields{/g} reduces the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s combat efficiency: on its next turn, it will have reduced movement {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}speed{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:FiringRangeSpace}firing range{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Die Wiederherstellung der Schilde verringert die Kampfeffizienz des {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}Flaggschiffs{/g}: In seiner nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Runde{/g} hat es eine verringerte {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}Bewegungsgeschwindigkeit{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:Range}Feuerreichweite{/g}.

languages.text: {g|f:bd61b300bcd84e06a80c8cf3b699c78b}Le redémarrage des boucliers{/g} réduit l'efficacité au combat du {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}vaisseau amiral{/g}. Lors du tour suivant, sa {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}vitesse{/g} et sa {g|Encyclopedia:FiringRangeSpace}portée de tir{/g} s'en trouveront réduites.
languages.original_text: {g|f:bd61b300bcd84e06a80c8cf3b699c78b}Restart Shields{/g} reduces the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s combat efficiency: on its next turn, it will have reduced movement {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}speed{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:FiringRangeSpace}firing range{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Le redémarrage des boucliers réduit l'efficacité au combat du {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}vaisseau amiral{/g}. Lors du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}suivant, sa {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}vitesse{/g} et sa {g|Encyclopedia:Range}portée{/g} de tir s’en trouveront réduites.
